alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 11 at 1:18PM MST until April 11 at 3:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 315 PM MST. * At 115 PM MST, a large dust plume originating from the Red Lake dry lake bed was spreading northeast into the Hualapai Reservation in Mohave County. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by satellite observations. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes areas mainly northwest of Old Route 66 and includes the Hualapai Reservation and Grand Canyon West. Locations impacted include... Grand Canyon Skywalk, Diamond Creek Campground and Grand Canyon Ranch. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE! To report severe weather, contact the National Weather Service, or your nearest law enforcement agency, who will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Las Vegas.
